snippet: Dellin Betances, once a top 50 prospect, has struggled at Class AAA, but after a couple of encouraging outings the Yankees called him up to shore up their overtaxed bullpen.
abstract: Dellin Betances, once a top 50 prospect, has struggled at Class AAA, but after a couple of encouraging outings the Yankees called him up to shore up their overtaxed bullpen.

headline.main: Out of Necessity, Yanks Call Up Betances
